snippet.title: Who Killed Mordechai Grey? The 6 Murderous Muses revealed!
snippet.description:
Which of the 6 Muses killed Mordechai Grey? It could have been any of them, as the murderer is randomly picked at the start of each game. Stuck? Share a seed with a friend and "know" whodunit before you play...

Spend three nights in a cursed gallery solving the cold-case murder of Mordechai Grey, a tortured artist killed by one of six deadly muses. Hang portraits to see into the past, whilst solving puzzles and exploring ever-changing rooms. Will you be artful enough to catch the murderous muse?

The 4th FMV game from D'Avekki Studios, creators of "The Infectious Madness of Doctor Dekker", "The Shapeshifting Detective" and "Dark Nights with Poe and Munro". "Murderous Muses" blends FMV with a procedurally generated 3D gallery that is infinitely replayable.

Wishlist on Steam!:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1727270/Murderous_Muses/

Official Website and copyright info:
https://murderousmuses.com/

D'Avekki Studios Linktree:
https://linktr.ee/davekki
